com.grupp4.quiznavigator.model

Class QuestionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.grupp4.quiznavigator.model.QuestionManager

  • public class QuestionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Johan Hugg An attempt to manage questions in the mapactivity more easily, this makes it so that the mapactivity doesn't have to do everything and can instead rely on the manager to make sure question indexes and everything else is more easily mantained.
